name: Vanishing Point (itch)
description: Vanishing Point is the Capstone Thesis game for a group of students at the NYU GameCenter. The original prototyped was created by Andrew DiVittorio and has been in development for the last year with his team of Sam Blake, Sawyer Smith, Santiago Fernandez, Justin Vo, Gabi Dias, Drew Caines, and Siena Sockel. This build is the current exhibition build the game.
